typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SchemaOnRead
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesWithSchema
MapDriftedColumn, MoviesWithSchema join(MapDriftedColumn@movie == MoviesWithSchema@movie,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
SchemaOnRead derive(movie = toInteger(byName('movie')),
		each(match(type == 'string'), $$ = initCap($$))) ~> MapDriftedColumn
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['parquetMovies.parquet'],
	mapColumn(
		movie = MapDriftedColumn@movie,
		movie = MoviesWithSchema@movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTom = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
